Movie.Name: The Shawshank Redemption
Movie.Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Movie.Name: The Godfather
Movie.Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Movie.Name: The Godfather: Part II
Movie.Description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.

Movie.Name: Pulp Fiction
Movie.Description: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Movie.Name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo.
Movie.Description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Movie.Name: 12 Angry Men
Movie.Description: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.

Movie.Name: Schindler's List
Movie.Description: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Movie.Name: The Dark Knight
Movie.Description: Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent are forced to deal with the chaos unleashed by a terrorist mastermind known only as the Joker, as he drives each of them to their limits.

Movie.Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Movie.Description: The former Fellowship of the Ring prepare for the final battle for Middle Earth, while Frodo & Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.

Movie.Name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Movie.Description: Upon arrival at a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients together to take on the oppressive Nurse Ratched, a woman more a dictator than a nurse.

Movie.Name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Movie.Description: While Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training from Yoda, his friends are relentlessly pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

Movie.Name: Fight Club
Movie.Description: An office employee and a soap salesman build a global organization to help vent male aggression.

Movie.Name: Inception
Movie.Description: In a world where technology exists to enter the human mind through dream invasion, a highly skilled thief is given a final chance at redemption which involves executing his toughest job to date: Inception.

Movie.Name: Shichinin no samurai
Movie.Description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

Movie.Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Movie.Description: In a small village in the Shire a young Hobbit named Frodo has been entrusted with an ancient Ring. Now he must embark on an Epic quest to the Cracks of Doom in order to destroy it.

Movie.Name: Goodfellas
Movie.Description: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

Movie.Name: Star Wars
Movie.Description: Luke Skywalker leaves his home planet, teams up with other rebels, and tries to save Princess Leia from the evil clutches of Darth Vader.

Movie.Name: Cidade de Deus
Movie.Description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

Movie.Name: Casablanca
Movie.Description: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

Movie.Name: The Matrix
Movie.Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Movie.Name: C'era una volta il West
Movie.Description: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Movie.Name: Rear Window
Movie.Description: A wheelchair bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

Movie.Name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Movie.Description: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

Movie.Name: The Silence of the Lambs
Movie.Description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

Movie.Name: The Usual Suspects
Movie.Description: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

Movie.Name: Se7en
Movie.Description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

Movie.Name: Forrest Gump
Movie.Description: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny, eludes him.

Movie.Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Movie.Description: Frodo and Sam continue on to Mordor in their mission to destroy the One Ring. Whilst their former companions make new allies and launch an assault on Isengard.

Movie.Name: Psycho
Movie.Description: A young woman steals $40,000 from her employer's client, and subsequently encounters a young motel proprietor too long under the domination of his mother.

Movie.Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Movie.Description: An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.

Movie.Name: Léon
Movie.Description: Professional assassin Leon reluctantly takes care of 12-year-old Mathilda, a neighbor whose parents are killed, and teaches her his trade.

Movie.Name: Memento
Movie.Description: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

Movie.Name: Sunset Blvd.
Movie.Description: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

Movie.Name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Movie.Description: An insane general starts a process to nuclear holocaust that a war room of politicians and generals frantically try to stop.

Movie.Name: Apocalypse Now
Movie.Description: During the on-going Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade Green Beret who has set himself up as a God among a local tribe.

Movie.Name: American History X
Movie.Description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

Movie.Name: North by Northwest
Movie.Description: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

Movie.Name: Citizen Kane
Movie.Description: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

Movie.Name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Movie.Description: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator.

Movie.Name: Saving Private Ryan
Movie.Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of US soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Movie.Name: American Beauty
Movie.Description: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.

Movie.Name: Toy Story 3
Movie.Description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Movie.Name: Alien
Movie.Description: A mining ship, investigating a suspected SOS, lands on a distant planet. The crew discovers some strange creatures and investigates.

Movie.Name: Taxi Driver
Movie.Description: A mentally unstable Vietnam war veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge to violently lash out, attempting to save a teenage prostitute in the process.

Movie.Name: City Lights
Movie.Description: The Tramp struggles to help a blind flower girl he has fallen in love with.

Movie.Name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
Movie.Description: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.

Movie.Name: Vertigo
Movie.Description: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

Movie.Name: The Shining
Movie.Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

Movie.Name: Paths of Glory
Movie.Description: When soldiers in WW1 refuse to continue with an impossible attack, their superiors decide to make an example of them.

Movie.Name: M
Movie.Description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

Movie.Name: The Pianist
Movie.Description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Movie.Name: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
Movie.Description: Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.

Movie.Name: The Departed
Movie.Description: Two men from opposite sides of the law are undercover within the Massachusetts State Police and the Irish mafia, but violence and bloodshed boil when discoveries are made, and the moles are dispatched to find out their enemy's identities.

Movie.Name: Double Indemnity
Movie.Description: An insurance rep lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

Movie.Name: WALL·E
Movie.Description: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Movie.Name: Das Leben der Anderen
Movie.Description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Movie.Name: Modern Times
Movie.Description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Movie.Name: A Clockwork Orange
Movie.Description: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan.

Movie.Name: Aliens
Movie.Description: The planet from Alien has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

Movie.Name: Lawrence of Arabia
Movie.Description: Epic rumination on a flamboyant and controversial British military figure and his conflicted loyalties during wartime service.

Movie.Name: To Kill a Mockingbird
Movie.Description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

Movie.Name: La vita è bella
Movie.Description: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.

Movie.Name: Back to the Future
Movie.Description: In 1985, Doc Brown invents time travel; in 1955, Marty McFly accidentally prevents his parents from meeting, putting his own existence at stake.

Movie.Name: Das Boot
Movie.Description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

Movie.Name: Requiem for a Dream
Movie.Description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

Movie.Name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Movie.Description: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

Movie.Name: Reservoir Dogs
Movie.Description: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Movie.Name: The Third Man
Movie.Description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, black-market opportunist Harry Lime.

Movie.Name: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
Movie.Description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimers.

Movie.Name: The Prestige
Movie.Description: The rivalry between two magicians is exacerbated when one of them performs the ultimate illusion.

Movie.Name: The Green Mile
Movie.Description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Movie.Name: L.A. Confidential
Movie.Description: A shooting at an all night diner is investigated by three LA policemen in their own unique ways.

Movie.Name: Chinatown
Movie.Description: A private detective investigating an adultery case stumbles on to a scheme of murder that has something to do with water.

Movie.Name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
Movie.Description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

Movie.Name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
Movie.Description: Frank Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

Movie.Name: The Great Dictator
Movie.Description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel has a doppelganger, a poor but kind Jewish barber living in the slums, who one day is mistaken for Hynkel.

Movie.Name: Gladiator
Movie.Description: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

Movie.Name: Once Upon a Time in America
Movie.Description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to Brooklyn over 30 years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Movie.Name: Rashômon
Movie.Description: A heinous crime and its aftermath are recalled from differing points of view.

Movie.Name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Movie.Description: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.

Movie.Name: Full Metal Jacket
Movie.Description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow Marine recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting set in 1968 in Hue, Vietnam.

Movie.Name: Amadeus
Movie.Description: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told in flashback mode by Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

Movie.Name: Ladri di biciclette
Movie.Description: A man and his son search for a stolen bicycle vital for his job.

Movie.Name: Raging Bull
Movie.Description: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.

Movie.Name: Some Like It Hot
Movie.Description: When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Movie.Name: Singin' in the Rain
Movie.Description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

Movie.Name: All About Eve
Movie.Description: An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

Movie.Name: Braveheart
Movie.Description: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

Movie.Name: Metropolis
Movie.Description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Movie.Name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
Movie.Description: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

Movie.Name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Movie.Description: Mankind finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, artifact buried on the moon and, with the intelligent computer HAL, sets off on a quest.

Movie.Name: Oldeuboi
Movie.Description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

Movie.Name: El laberinto del fauno
Movie.Description: In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

Movie.Name: The Apartment
Movie.Description: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

Movie.Name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Movie.Description: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the Second Death Star, while Luke Skywalker tries to bring his father back to the Light Side of the Force.

Movie.Name: Unforgiven
Movie.Description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

Movie.Name: The Sting
Movie.Description: In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

Movie.Name: Der Untergang
Movie.Description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

Movie.Name: Mononoke-hime
Movie.Description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Movie.Name: Inglourious Basterds
Movie.Description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as "The Basterds" are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by scalping and brutally killing Nazis.

Movie.Name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Movie.Description: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.

Movie.Name: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
Movie.Description: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the US Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

Movie.Name: The Lion King
Movie.Description: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.

Movie.Name: The Elephant Man
Movie.Description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.

Movie.Name: Up
Movie.Description: By tying thousands of balloon to his home, 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America. Right after lifting off, however, he learns he isn't alone on his journey, since Russell, a wilderness explorer 70 years his junior, has inadvertently become a stowaway on the trip.

Movie.Name: On the Waterfront
Movie.Description: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

Movie.Name: Die Hard
Movie.Description: New York cop John McClane gives terrorists a dose of their own medicine as they hold hostages in an LA office building.

Movie.Name: Hotaru no haka
Movie.Description: A tragic film covering a young boy and his little sister's struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Movie.Name: Det sjunde inseglet
Movie.Description: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

Movie.Name: The Maltese Falcon
Movie.Description: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

Movie.Name: The Great Escape
Movie.Description: Allied POWs plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

Movie.Name: Gran Torino
Movie.Description: Disgruntled Korean War vet Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a young Hmong teenager, who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: his 1972 Gran Torino.

Movie.Name: Rebecca
Movie.Description: When a naive young woman marries a rich widower and settles in his gigantic mansion, she finds the memory of the first wife maintaining a grip on her husband and the servants.

Movie.Name: Yôjinbô
Movie.Description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

Movie.Name: Batman Begins
Movie.Description: Bruce Wayne has watched his home, Gotham City, turn into a crime infested abyss throughout his entire life, so he decides to become the hero Gotham needs- Batman.

Movie.Name: Per qualche dollaro in più
Movie.Description: Two bounty hunters with completely different intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

Movie.Name: Witness for the Prosecution
Movie.Description: Agatha Christie tale of a man on trial for murder: a trial featuring surprise after surprise.

Movie.Name: The Artist
Movie.Description: Hollywood, 1927: As silent movie star George Valentin wonders if the arrival of talking pictures will cause him to fade into oblivion, he sparks with Peppy Miller, a young dancer set for a big break.

Movie.Name: The General
Movie.Description: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single handedly and straight through enemy lines.

Movie.Name: Snatch.
Movie.Description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Movie.Name: Heat
Movie.Description: The lives of two men on opposite sides of the law - one a detective; the other a thief.

Movie.Name: Fargo
Movie.Description: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Movie.Name: Blade Runner
Movie.Description: Deckard, a blade runner, has to track down and terminate 4 replicants who hijacked a ship in space and have returned to earth seeking their maker.

Movie.Name: Sin City
Movie.Description: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

Movie.Name: Ran
Movie.Description: An elderly lord abdicates to his three sons, and the two corrupt ones turn against him.

Movie.Name: Smultronstället
Movie.Description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

Movie.Name: Touch of Evil
Movie.Description: Stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in Mexican border town.

Movie.Name: Toy Story
Movie.Description: A cowboy toy is profoundly threatened and jealous when a fancy spaceman toy supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Movie.Name: Hotel Rwanda
Movie.Description: The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

Movie.Name: Jaws
Movie.Description: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.

Movie.Name: No Country for Old Men
Movie.Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon some dead bodies, a stash of heroin and more than $2 million in cash near the Rio Grande.

Movie.Name: The Big Lebowski
Movie.Description: "Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Movie.Name: Black Swan
Movie.Description: A ballet dancer wins the lead in "Swan Lake" and is perfect for the role of the delicate White Swan - Princess Odette - but slowly loses her mind as she becomes more and more like Odile, the Black Swan.

Movie.Name: The King's Speech
Movie.Description: The story of King George VI of Britain, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.

Movie.Name: The Deer Hunter
Movie.Description: An in-depth examination of the way that the Vietnam war affects the lives of people in a small industrial town in the USA.

Movie.Name: Cool Hand Luke
Movie.Description: A man refuses to conform to life in a rural prison.

Movie.Name: The Wizard of Oz
Movie.Description: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

Movie.Name: The Sixth Sense
Movie.Description: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

Movie.Name: It Happened One Night
Movie.Description: A spoiled heiress, running away from her family, is helped by a man who's actually a reporter looking for a story.

Movie.Name: Ikiru
Movie.Description: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Movie.Name: Strangers on a Train
Movie.Description: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder...a theory that he plans to implement.

Movie.Name: Scarface
Movie.Description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.

Movie.Name: Annie Hall
Movie.Description: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

Movie.Name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
Movie.Description: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

Movie.Name: Warrior
Movie.Description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision corner with his older brother.

Movie.Name: The Kid
Movie.Description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

Movie.Name: High Noon
Movie.Description: A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.

Movie.Name: Le salaire de la peur
Movie.Description: In a decrepit South American village, men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

Movie.Name: Platoon
Movie.Description: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

Movie.Name: The Gold Rush
Movie.Description: The Tramp goes the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

Movie.Name: Trainspotting
Movie.Description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

Movie.Name: Into the Wild
Movie.Description: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Movie.Name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Movie.Description: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

Movie.Name: Donnie Darko
Movie.Description: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

Movie.Name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Movie.Description: Four London working class stiffs pool their money to put one in a high stakes card game, but things go wrong and they end up owing half a million pounds and having one week to come up with the cash.

Movie.Name: El secreto de sus ojos
Movie.Description: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

Movie.Name: The Grapes of Wrath
Movie.Description: A poor Midwest family is forced off of their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

Movie.Name: Notorious
Movie.Description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

Movie.Name: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
Movie.Description: A married farmer falls under the spell of a slatternly woman from the city, who tries to convince him to drown his wife.

Movie.Name: Slumdog Millionaire
Movie.Description: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

Movie.Name: Gone with the Wind
Movie.Description: American classic in which a manipulative woman and a roguish man carry on a turbulent love affair in the American south during the Civil War and Reconstruction.

Movie.Name: Million Dollar Baby
Movie.Description: A hardened trainer/manager works with a determined woman in her attempt to establish herself as a boxer.

Movie.Name: The Thing
Movie.Description: Scientists in the Antarctic are confronted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of the people that it kills.

Movie.Name: There Will Be Blood
Movie.Description: A story about family, greed, religion, and oil, centered around a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Movie.Name: Casino
Movie.Description: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

Movie.Name: Life of Brian
Movie.Description: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

Movie.Name: Amores perros
Movie.Description: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

Movie.Name: Groundhog Day
Movie.Description: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.

Movie.Name: Les diaboliques
Movie.Description: The wife of a cruel headmaster and his mistress conspire to kill him, but after the murder is committed, his body disappears, and strange events begin to plague the two women.

Movie.Name: Ben-Hur
Movie.Description: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

Movie.Name: Finding Nemo
Movie.Description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Movie.Name: Tonari no Totoro
Movie.Description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wonderous forest spirits who live nearby.

Movie.Name: The Big Sleep
Movie.Description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

Movie.Name: The Terminator
Movie.Description: A human-looking, apparently unstoppable cyborg is sent from the future to kill Sarah Connor; Kyle Reese is sent to stop it.

Movie.Name: How to Train Your Dragon
Movie.Description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

Movie.Name: The Best Years of Our Lives
Movie.Description: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

Movie.Name: The Graduate
Movie.Description: Recent college graduate Benjamin Braddock is trapped into an affair with Mrs. Robinson, who happens to be the wife of his father's business partner and then finds himself falling in love with her daughter, Elaine.

Movie.Name: V for Vendetta
Movie.Description: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as "V" uses terrorist tactics to fight against his totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.

Movie.Name: Stand by Me
Movie.Description: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

Movie.Name: Twelve Monkeys
Movie.Description: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Movie.Name: Dog Day Afternoon
Movie.Description: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

Movie.Name: Good Will Hunting
Movie.Description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Movie.Name: The Bourne Ultimatum
Movie.Description: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

Movie.Name: Judgment at Nuremberg
Movie.Description: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

Movie.Name: The Manchurian Candidate
Movie.Description: A former Korean War POW is brainwashed by Communists into becoming a political assassin. But another former prisoner may know how to save him.

Movie.Name: District 9
Movie.Description: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

Movie.Name: Network
Movie.Description: A TV network cynically exploits a deranged ex-TV anchor's ravings and revelations about the media for their own profit.

Movie.Name: Gandhi
Movie.Description: Biography of 'Mahatma Gandhi' , the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of non-violent protest.

Movie.Name: The Night of the Hunter
Movie.Description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

Movie.Name: Les quatre cents coups
Movie.Description: Intensely touching story of a misunderstood young adolescent who left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

Movie.Name: Mary and Max
Movie.Description: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

Movie.Name: La battaglia di Algeri
Movie.Description: An account of the bloodiest revolution in modern history.

Movie.Name: 8½
Movie.Description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

Movie.Name: Persona
Movie.Description: A nurse is put in charge of an actress who can't talk and finds that the actress's persona is melding with hers.

Movie.Name: Dial M for Murder
Movie.Description: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.

Movie.Name: The Princess Bride
Movie.Description: A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).

Movie.Name: The Killing
Movie.Description: Crooks plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

Movie.Name: The Wrestler
Movie.Description: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

Movie.Name: The Hustler
Movie.Description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Movie.Name: Ratatouille
Movie.Description: Remy is a young rat in the French countryside who arrives in Paris, only to find out that his cooking idol is dead. When he makes an unusual alliance with a restaurant's new garbage boy, the culinary and personal adventures begin despite Remy's family's skepticism and the rat-hating world of humans.

Movie.Name: La strada
Movie.Description: A carefree girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

Movie.Name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
Movie.Description: A bitter aging couple with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

Movie.Name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
Movie.Description: A chronicle of the trial of Jeanne d'Arc on charges of heresy, and the efforts of her ecclesiastical jurists to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

Movie.Name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Movie.Description: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord.

Movie.Name: Fanny och Alexander
Movie.Description: The title characters are children in the exuberant and colorful Ekdahl household in a Swedish town early in the twentieth century... See full summary »

Movie.Name: Seppuku
Movie.Description: An elder ronin samurai arrives at a feudal lord's home and requests an honorable place to commit suicide. But when the ronin inquires about a younger samurai who arrived before him things take an unexpected turn.

Movie.Name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
Movie.Description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking home.

Movie.Name: The Exorcist
Movie.Description: When a child is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

Movie.Name: Sherlock Jr.
Movie.Description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

Movie.Name: Le scaphandre et le papillon
Movie.Description: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

Movie.Name: The Wild Bunch
Movie.Description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

Movie.Name: Stalag 17
Movie.Description: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German POW camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Movie.Name: A Streetcar Named Desire
Movie.Description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

Movie.Name: Barry Lyndon
Movie.Description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's position in 18th Century aristocracy.

Movie.Name: Star Trek
Movie.Description: A chronicle of the early days of James T. Kirk and his fellow USS Enterprise crew members.

Movie.Name: Rocky
Movie.Description: A small time boxer gets a once in a lifetime chance to fight the heavyweight champ in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

Movie.Name: Kind Hearts and Coronets
Movie.Description: A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

Movie.Name: All Quiet on the Western Front
Movie.Description: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

Movie.Name: The Truman Show
Movie.Description: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.

Movie.Name: Le notti di Cabiria
Movie.Description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

Movie.Name: Mou gaan dou
Movie.Description: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

Movie.Name: Avatar
Movie.Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Movie.Name: A Beautiful Mind
Movie.Description: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.

Movie.Name: Rosemary's Baby
Movie.Description: A young couple move into a new apartment, only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins controlling her life.

Movie.Name: Roman Holiday
Movie.Description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

Movie.Name: Rope
Movie.Description: Two young men strangle their "inferior" classmate, hide his body in their apartment, and invite his friends and family to a dinner party as a means to challenge the "perfection" of their crime.

Movie.Name: Yip Man
Movie.Description: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun.

Movie.Name: Mystic River
Movie.Description: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

Movie.Name: Låt den rätte komma in
Movie.Description: Oscar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

Movie.Name: Tôkyô monogatari
Movie.Description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city; but the children have little time for them.

Movie.Name: Festen
Movie.Description: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

Movie.Name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
Movie.Description: A senator, who became famous for killing a notorious outlaw, returns for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

Movie.Name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Movie.Description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

Movie.Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Movie.Description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Movie.Name: Magnolia
Movie.Description: An epic mosaic of several interrelated characters in search of happiness, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

Movie.Name: Drive
Movie.Description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman, mechanic and getaway driver lands himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbour.

Movie.Name: Manhattan
Movie.Description: A divorced New Yorker currently dating a high-schooler brings himself to look for love in the mistress of his best friend instead.

Movie.Name: Big Fish
Movie.Description: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.

Movie.Name: Stalker
Movie.Description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

Movie.Name: The Incredibles
Movie.Description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Movie.Name: In Bruges
Movie.Description: Holed up in Bruges, Belgium after a difficult job, two hit men begin to differ on their views of life and death as they become used to local customs.

Movie.Name: Beauty and the Beast
Movie.Description: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

Movie.Name: Hugo (II)
Movie.Description: Set in 1930s Paris, an orphan who lives in the walls of a train station is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

Movie.Name: Kaze no tani no Naushika
Movie.Description: Warrior/pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Movie.Name: Monsters, Inc.
Movie.Description: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.

Movie.Name: 3 Idiots
Movie.Description: Two friends embark on a quest for a lost buddy. On this journey, they encounter a long forgotten bet, a wedding they must crash, and a funeral that goes impossibly out of control.

Movie.Name: Tropa de Elite 2 - O Inimigo Agora É Outro
Movie.Description: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

Movie.Name: Shutter Island
Movie.Description: Drama set in 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.

Movie.Name: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
Movie.Description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

Movie.Name: Trois couleurs: Rouge
Movie.Description: Final entry in a trilogy of films dealing with contemporary French society concerns a model who discovers her neighbour is keen on invading people's privacy.
